Name: Regalo De Dios Group
description:
Carlos is 30 years old. He works in agriculture. He is married and the father of a son.

He started working at a young age, job sharing with other people. In order to cover some costs of production he seeks a Fundenuse loan, with Kiva funds, because of the interest rates and the support they give to small producers.

Carlos is part of the Regalo de Dios solidarity group with Francisco and Alejandro. They work in the same trade.
